group_1.narration: Some time had passed since@I became a ghost...

group_1.textRight: They weren't kidding... [chara:303700:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:303700:motion_400][chara:303700:lipSynch_1]Our reflections@don't show in the glass!

group_1.narration: Seeing Kanae turned into part@of my daily routine.

group_1.textRight: While I was alive, I was a bit scared of@walking around the park at night.
But now it's like we have full run of the@place! It rules!

group_1.narration: I floated around the familiar streets of@Kamihama, no real aim in mind.

group_1.textRight: [chara:303700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Gosh! The night sky is even prettier when@you look at it from up in the air!

group_1.narration: There wasn't all that much need for me to@devote myself to telling fortunes, either.@It wasn't like I had a future, being dead...
So I spent my days idling@away the time, just wandering@around and doing whatever...
But just when I thought that's all there was@to it...

group_1.textRight: Kanae!
Have you felt what's been happening lately?
Something weird's going on! Something really@weird! And it's happening in Kamihama!
There's WAY more Witches now, and@Magical Girls are on the rise too.
I've seen...geeze, I don't know how many@Magical Girls fighting out there!
And even they're starting to think something@must be wrong!
SO!
*Sigh* I'm worried about Yachiyo@and the others.
I wonder how they're doing...and if they're@all right.

group_1.textLeft: She seems like she's holding up okay.
Though a bunch of stuff has been going on.

group_1.textRight: What? She's doing well? [chara:303700:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:303700:cheek_0][chara:303700:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:303700:lipSynch_1]That's a load off...
[chara:303700:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wait.
She seems to be okay?
What?! Did you go and check on her?!

group_1.textLeft: I just happened to see her.

group_1.textRight: And I didn't know about it?! You did it@without telling me?!
That's cheating! Super cheating! I haven't@gone to see her even once!
Excuse me?!

group_1.textLeft: You could've gone whenever you wanted.

group_1.textRight: Well, yeah, but...
Why didn't I? Well...uhh...

group_1.textLeft: I thought today was supposed to be lucky.@What kind of luck is this?

group_1.textRight: No, it is lucky... I...m-managed to save@you, Yachiyo-senpai...

group_1.narration: I saved...the leader I look up to so much...@I'm...really happy...I did...

group_1.textRight: I guess it'd be kind of embarrassing!@Ah ha ha...
And besides...
It might...hurt, if I saw her again.
Because I can't do anything to help her.
The thought of going to see her on my own@is kinda tough.

group_1.textLeft: Then what if I went with you?

group_1.textRight: If you were there...
I think I could!

group_1.narration: Actually, I'd been wanting to go@and see Yachiyo with Kanae.@I just couldn't find the words to ask.
Kanae said she stumbled on her@recently by chance. And that she@was reluctant to go see her, too...
I think her reasons were the same as mine.

group_1.textCenter: I can't do anything to help her anymore.
Even if I'm near, it makes no difference.
Thinking that made me feel like my existence@itself was meaningless...
And I just couldn't stand it.

group_1.narration: But she couldn't just ignore@Yachiyo when she saw her...@She had to see how she was doing.
And she told me what she saw.

group_1.textRight: What? Really?

group_1.textLeft: Yachiyo feels responsible for everything@that happened.

group_1.textRight: Responsible? Wait, you don't mean...
No way! Why would she blame herself for@that?!
I don't regret what I did! I was able to@save her!
She shouldn't feel responsible for that!
You feel the same way, don't you, Kanae?!

group_1.textLeft: But...I'm sure she doesn't feel that way.
This is Yachiyo we're talking about.

group_1.textRight: But...

group_1.narration: After I heard that, I kind of felt like@I shouldn't go to see her.
But my concern for her gave me the push I @needed to overcome that.
After asking lots of other ghosts,@we tracked her down!

group_1.textLeft: Iroha, you can't go home. You're coming@to my place.

group_1.textRight: What?![chara:100102:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]

group_1.textLeft: There's something you wanted to tell me,@right?
That's what you said when I was carrying you.

group_1.textRight: B-but my mom will be mad...

group_1.textLeft: Don't worry, I'll talk to her.

group_1.textRight: O-okay...

group_1.narration: There was a Magical Girl there...@Iroha.
